Name: The Finn Balor "The Demon" Starter Pack
Description: Get a 2-Star Silver Finn Balor "The Demon" and power him up 50 levels right away with the included Coins and TP. Use the extra Cash for a chance to add another Superstar to your Roster through Mega Superstar Loot!

Description: Get a 2-Star Bronze Kurt Angle and power him up 40 levels right away with the included Coins and TP. Use the extra Cash for a chance to add another Superstar to your Roster through Mega Superstar Loot!

Description: Get a 2-Star Bronze Ric Flair "The Nature Boy" and power him up 40 levels right away with the included Coins and TP. Use the extra Cash for a chance to add another Superstar to your Roster through Mega Superstar Loot!
